content.question: Which of the following questions about the components in a mixture could be investigated with a paper chromatography experiment?

choices.label: Do the components have different densities?
Do the components have different molecular masses?
Do the components have different molecular polarities?
Do the components have different average molecular speeds?

content.answer: Do the components have different molecular polarities?

skill.text: 2.A: Identify a testable scientific question based on an observation, data, or a model.
